name: Death on the Nile
description: While on vacation on the Nile, Hercule Poirot must investigate the murder of a young heiress.

review.author: henryspencer-44542
review.heading: Not bad at all really enjoyed it
review.reviewBody: I actually really enjoyed this movie it's not as good as murder On the express it's really good I thought that I really enjoyed it the trailer look really good and I wasn't disappointed with it I thought they was really good I don't know why it gets very low ratings I thought that it was very storyline was very exciting really good movie one of the best movies I've watched of 2022 I really enjoyed it from start to finish really enjoyed watching this movie it's not as good as I thought it would be but it's not bad it's not average I think it's just a decent movie interesting story Great movie....
